com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension
Interface XMLEditorContext

public interface XMLEditorContext

This interface provides information regarding the editing environment (e.g information provided in the configuration files). Warning: this class may not be compatible with future releases.

getMessagesArea

public MessagesArea getMessagesArea()

the Editor's Message-Area. Use it to report errors, warnings etc.
